divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing in my back yard observing with binoculars a small 2 engineaircraft circling over Boise, Idaho at approximately 3000 feet, when I noticed asilver disc much higher up. The disc was unmistakable, silver, and flying in asouthsouthwest direction. I was able to keep the disc in sight for 6 seconds.There was no sound, no contrail and the disc appeared to be at a high altitudeof approximately 20 to 25000 feet. Time of the sighting was 1105 am on MondayJune 9th 2003. The sky was clear, blue, and unobstructed making the sightingvery obvious. The size of the disc was the size of an aspirin held at armslength.
trends: There have been 69 other sightings in Boise
There were no other sightings in Boise on or around June 9th 2003
